column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Wednesday October 2 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: Russell Cave Rd between Greenwich Pike and Hughes Ln
column5: Serious collision involving a motorcycle.  Roadway shutdown in both directions until further notice.

column4: Update 9:28 a.m. - The roadway is expected to be open before 10 a.m.
Effective Monday October 7, 2019, the ferry is scheduled to be closed for approximately 4 weeks.
The closure is due to dry docking as required every five years by the United States Coast Guard.
